thread.title: Hurricane Centre calling Patricia a record storm
thread.title_full: Hurricane Centre calling Patricia a record storm | News24

author: news24.com
title: Hurricane Centre calling Patricia a record storm
text:
Washington - The US National Hurricane Centre says Hurricane Patricia is the strongest storm on record for the eastern north Pacific as it moves toward Mexico's coast.
The Category 5 storm's maximum sustained winds increased early on Friday to near 325kph.
The Hurricane Center is predicting a "potentially catastrophic landfall" in southwestern Mexico later in the day.
Patricia is centered about 255km south-southwest of Manzanillo, Mexico, and is moving north-northwest near 17kph.
